name: hellion
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who causes a lot of trouble: Some children are very cute and sweet as infants but turn into hellions once they become toddlers. We're sure that the hellions who hang around the park are responsible for the broken window.
More examplesFewer examplesThe film was about a romance between a bored small-town girl and a hellion on the run from the law. As a teenager he was a hellion who was often suspended from school and later found himself in trouble with the police.
